metadata.title: CVE-2020-14326 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in RESTEasy, where RootNode incorrectly cachesroutes. This issue results in hash flooding, leading to slower requestswith higher CPU time spent searching and adding the entry. This flaw allowsan attacker to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: resteasy3.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
